list-view-config.query-select:
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX core: <http://vivoweb.org/ontology/core#> PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX vitro: <http://vitro.mannlib.cornell.edu/ns/vitro/0.7#> PREFIX fn: <http://www.w3.org/2005/xpath-functions#> PREFIX uowvivo: <http://uowvivo.uow.edu.au/ontology/uowvivo#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?subclass ?editorship ?editorshipLabel ?person ?personName ?isHonorary ?hideEditor WHERE { ?subject ?property ?editorship . ?editorship rdfs:label ?editorshipLabel . OPTIONAL { ?editorship core:rank ?rank } OPTIONAL { ?editorship core:relates ?person . ?person a foaf:Agent . ?person rdfs:label ?personName OPTIONAL { ?editorship core:relates ?person . ?person a foaf:Agent . ?person vitro:mostSpecificType ?subclass . ?subclass rdfs:subClassOf foaf:Agent } OPTIONAL { ?person core:hideFromDisplay ?hideEditor } } ?editorship core:relates ?person . bind(EXISTS {?person a uowvivo:honorary} as ?isHonorary ) .
FILTER ( bound(?person) )
} ORDER BY ?subclass ?rank (fn:lower-case(?personName))
list-view-config.query-construct: PREFIX core: <http://vivoweb.org/ontology/core#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX vitro: <http://vitro.mannlib.cornell.edu/ns/vitro/0.7#> PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX uowvivo: <http://uowvivo.uow.edu.au/ontology/uowvivo#> CONSTRUCT { ?subject ?property ?editorship . ?editorship a core:Editorship . ?editorship core:relates ?person . ?editorship rdfs:label ?editorshipLabel . ?person a uowvivo:honorary . } WHERE { ?subject ?property ?editorship . ?editorship a core:Editorship . ?editorship core:relates ?person . ?editorship rdfs:label ?editorshipLabel . ?person a uowvivo:honorary . }
